com.gwt.ss
Class GwtSessionManagement

java.lang.Object
  com.gwt.ss.GwtSessionManagement
All Implemented Interfaces:
ServletContextAware
public class GwtSessionManagement
extends Object
implements ServletContextAware

If you apply Session Management in your secured gwt application,you need to make sure

  • property "proxy-target-class" of <aop:aspectj-autoproxy> set as "false" owing to Spring's proxy mechanism only allow null constructor,unfortunately SessionManagementFilter didn't.
  • Instantiate this bean

如果您的GWT程式設定了 Session Management，您必須
  • 將<aop:aspectj-autoproxy>的屬性"proxy-target-class"設為"false"，這是由於 Sprig AOP的proxy 機制不接受有參數的建構子，而SessionManagementFilter 的建構子卻含有參數
  • 建立本類別實例
